channel.title: Hello Stu
channel.description: A podcast of voice memos, shared openly for those that want to hear them. These might contain information about my health & fitness activites or about design, photogrpahy, film, music, society and everything else in between.
channel.itunes:author: Hello Stu
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast of audio notes, shared openly for those that want to hear them. This podcast will likely touch on topics such as my health & fitness activites, design, photography, film, music, society and everything else in between.

item.title: Rambling man
item.description: A quick introduction to the hello stu audio notes.
